name: Flags for our Future #4201
description:
Flags for our Future #4202
A human-in-loop AI generative artwork by the Future Scouts.

Using a set of 254 national flags (current as of 2021), we train visual GANs (generative adversarial networks) to generate sets of imaginary national flags. Each flag created by the model is a unique amalgamation of all national flags combined.

The artwork is a vexillological reflection on the future of national identity and nationhood, representing an optimistic vision of a world in which humans transcend nationalism to global citizenship and stewardship.

Learn more about the project at https://flags.ai

All benefits from sales of the Flags series go towards funding the Future Scouts (https://futurescouts.cc), a next-gen decentralized service organization.

4096 x 2533 px png
